name: Roll of Legends
description:
WARNING - DO NOT UPGRADE A DIE PAST 9 DOING SO WILL BREAK THE GAME

Create Characters of different classes to control the die faces

Click on paths to enter encounters

Click on the Die Faces to select them then click on a target to activate their ability

Sword -> Attack

Shield -> Defend

Heart -> Heal

Go to chests to get items which can be applied to die faces and automatically trigger when that face is rolled.

First Aid Kit -> Randomly Heal one Party Member

Firebolt -> Randomly Attack One Enemy

Parrying Dagger -> Randomly Give Defense to a Party Member

Note: Enemies can also have items but you can't see what they are or when they have them to add.... mystery.... yes mystery not just me not wanting to spend the time to add it

Reach the flag to generate a new floor

Music made using Neural Composer by Code Parade

SFX made with SFXR

Font made using FontStruct

Art Made in Aseprite
